price: 31.Kinnih immay ibliis malaykâ luk Nabii Aadamah kummaata num yakkem cineh.
arabic: إِلَّآ إِبۡلِيسَ أَبَىٰٓ أَن يَكُونَ مَعَ ٱلسَّٰجِدِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: illā ib'līsa abā an yakūna maʿa al-sājidīna
